step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in the next repetitions.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you move your hands toward your forehead.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding steady! Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward during the hold.
Nicely done returning to the start. Pay attention to keeping your wrists straighter as you bring your hands down.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your wrists straighter and your elbows closer together as you move your hands. This will help you get the most out of the stretch.
